metadata.description: I was raised in poetry. Live and direct, in your face spoken word poetry. I was the youngest poet in Sacramento history to be crowned the Mahogany Urban Poetry Queen of the Mic. It has always been my duty to free up our culture through my art.  A proud representative of a people who are too commonly portrayed as hypersexual, undesirable, and sexually deviant in mainstream society, our purposeful exploration of sex and pleasure is an act of advocacy. Through providing a soundtrack for body positivity, intimacy, and pleasure, I aim to uplift people to live our proudest, sexiest, and most fulfilled lives. This song is a dedication to living a feature-film worth life in every moment of the day.

lyrics.text:
Intro:
Lights, Camera, Action
Lights, Camera, Action
(Lights) 
Lights, Camera, Action (Lights)
Lights, Camera, Action

Verse 1:
I like my movies kinda intimate 
Quality time, ‘cause you’re into me
Centerfold, she be centerpiece
Beautiful like a melody 
I like my movies kinda intimate
Shawty gold, dripping melanin 
Beautiful like a melody
Beautiful like a melody 

Chorus:
I’m tryna make movie 
Come into the room, make it groovy
Is it a one or a two piece
Imma go and hit ‘em with that ooh wee
Let’s make a movie 
Come into the room, make it groovy
Touch and hold like you do me
Like you do me

Verse 2:
Lights, Camera, Action
You know how I do with the satisfaction 
10 out of 10, shawty be the whole package
Shawty be the whole package
Lights, Camera, Action
You know how I do with the satisfaction 
10 out of 10, shawty be the whole package
Shawty be the whole package

Refrain:
Let’s make a movie (movie)
Groovy (groovy)
Do me (do me)  
Let’s make a movie (movie)
Groovy (groovy)
Do me (do me)

Baby, I go enter in your vibe
You don’t even have to tell no lies

(Beautiful like a melody)

(Yeah)
I said I’m shooting 4K in the sky for you
Plot twists, get my blind side eyes for you
My hips wanna wind all night for you
I’m busy all week but it’s time for you
Said I’m falling for a ting like a domino 
You a big six so I gotta handle those
Baby so nice, ion gotta call my bros
Kari on Fire, you the fire code

Pre -Chorus:
Say “uhhh” (uhhh)
Baby, I go enter in your vibe
You don’t even have to tell no lies

Come into the room, make it groovy

(Centerfold, she be centerpiece)
